short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: detect toxic word by using tensorflowjs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension will detect toxic word by using tensorflowjs locally. It will take some time for the model to classify word. When toxic word is detected, it will be replaced with waning sign.It can detect only english words.
